explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses building an intelligent portfolio management system using machine learning techniques.
explanations.supervised learning: The abstract mentions that many promising results have been reported from the supervised learning community on building profitable trading systems.
explanations.reinforcement learning: The paper presents a new stock trading framework that enhances the performance of reinforcement learning-based systems, specifically using Q-learning agents.
explanations.representation learning: The paper presents a representation scheme to summarize the history of price changes, which is related to representation learning.
explanations.feature representation: The proposed representation scheme for summarizing price changes can be considered a form of feature representation.
